T02D1304:211b-3: dpal dgyes pa rdo rje la bstod pa /
T02D1304:211b-4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1304:211b-5: dngos po dngos med gnyis las byung //
T02D1304:211b-6: rmad byung chen po sku che ba //
T02D1304:211b-7: sku las 'das pa bde ba che //
T02D1304:211b-9: thugs rje chen po khro ba che //
T02D1304:211b-10: bdud kun rnam par 'joms mdzad pa //
T02D1304:211b-11: bdag med ma yi yid 'ong zhing //
T02D1304:211b-12: lha mo'i tshogs kyis rnam par sad //
T02D1304:211b-13: rnam dag dga' ba skyed mdzad cing //
T02D1304:211b-15: zhal brgyad 'khor ni brgyad ldan zhing //
T02D1304:211b-16: brgyad gnyis gyur pa'i phyag dang ldan //
T02D1304:211b-17: rnam par skrag byed ma lus nad //
T02D1304:211b-18: gsol bar mngon du phyogs pa'i zhal //
T02D1304:211b-19: h'um ni spro dang sdud mdzad pa'i //
T02D1304:211b-20: mi bzad rnam par 'dren pa po //
T02D1304:211b-22: nyon mongs nye bar 'joms pa po //
T02D1304:211b-23: glog 'gyu thugs rje'i rlan gyis brlan //
T02D1304:211b-24: dam chos char gyis rgyun 'bebs mdzad //
T02D1304:211b-25: ma rig gnyid kyis non pa yi //
T02D1304:211b-26: khams gsum pa dag rnam sad mdzad //
T02D1304:211b-27: thar pa'i lam ni rab ston pa'i //
T02D1304:211b-28: 'jig rten rnams la snang ba stsol //
T02D1304:211b-29: log par lhung ba'i 'gro kun la //
T02D1304:211b-30: phyag mang po rnams rab brkyang zhing //
T02D1304:211b-31: lha yi spyan ni rab 'jug pas //
T02D1304:211b-32: rmongs pa'i rab rib sel bar mdzad //
T02D1304:211b-33: rab tu gsal ba'i gsang chen po //
T02D1304:211b-34: don kun skad cig gis bsgrub pa //
T02D1304:211b-35: gsang sngags mi las rnam par grol //
T02D1304:211b-36: sems can kun la rjes brtse ba //
T02D1304:211b-37: rdo rje snying po byang chub pa'i //
T02D1304:211b-38: stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1304:211b-39: char sprin sdon po dang 'dra ba //
T02D1304:211b-40: dur khrod gnas su gar thabs bzhugs //
T02D1304:212a-2: lha mo'i zhal dang bcas par myos //
T02D1304:212a-3: zla tshes rtse 'dra'i mche ba mchog / mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor longs spyod pa //
T02D1304:212a-4: thod chen rgyu ma las brgyus pa'i //
T02D1304:212a-5: phreng bas sku ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1304:212a-6: rol par mdzad pa'i bzhad chen gyis //
T02D1304:212a-8: yang dag dran pas 'gro ba'i tshogs //
T02D1304:212a-9: yid la 'dod pa yongs rdzogs mdzad //
T02D1304:212a-10: yid bzhin nor bu las lhag pa'i //
T02D1304:212a-11: mang zhing rgya che'i bstod mchog gis //
T02D1304:212a-12: dag gi dbang phyug chen pos bstod //
T02D1304:212a-13: sgra yi yul las nges 'das shing //
T02D1304:212a-14: rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs //
T02D1304:212a-15: gti mug chen po yongs 'joms shing //
T02D1304:212a-16: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams dang //
T02D1304:212a-17: dpe byad yan lag thams cad ldan //
T02D1304:212a-18: mthong bas dga' ba 'phel bar mdzad //
T02D1304:212a-19: mchog tu grub pa'i rgyud rnams ni //
T02D1304:212a-20: yang dag tshim mdzad zla 'od bzang //
T02D1304:212a-21: thog ma bar dang mtha' med pa //
T02D1304:212a-22: dus gsum rdzogs sangs rgyas nyi ma //
T02D1304:212a-23: nyon mongs bud shing nges bsregs pa'i //
T02D1304:212a-24: me chen sdig pa pham mdzad pa'i //
T02D1304:212a-25: nyi zla me yi 'od zer gyi //
T02D1304:212a-26: zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa //
T02D1304:212a-27: spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i tsogs //
T02D1304:212a-28: rmongs pa'i dbye ba rnams gsum 'joms //
T02D1304:212a-29: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02D1304:212a-30: chags pa chen pos rab grol mdzad //
T02D1304:212a-31: rang rig grub pa mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1304:212a-32: bde ba'i thabs ni nye bar ston //
T02D1304:212a-33: srid dang mya ngan 'das las rgal //
T02D1304:212a-34: srid dang mya ngan 'das nang bzhugs //
T02D1304:212a-35: phyag rgya chen po'i mchu myang zhing //
T02D1304:212a-36: phyag rgya lngas legs rgyas btab la //
T02D1304:212a-37: shin tu 'khyud pa'i longs spyod kyis //
T02D1304:212a-38: rab bsgrub dga' bas rol par mdzad //
T02D1304:212a-39: ro yi thal bas yang dag byugs //
T02D1304:212a-40: rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1304:212a-41: mtshan mo'i dus su rol pa che //
T02D1304:212a-42: dpal ldan he ru ka la 'dud //
T02D1304:212a-43: gang zhig gtso bo spangs nas ni //
T02D1304:212a-44: skad cig tsam yang rol mi mdzad //
T02D1304:212a-45: skal bzang yid 'ong skal ba bzang //
T02D1304:212a-47: dbang po'i phyogs su tshangs pa ni //
T02D1304:212a-48: zhabs brdabs gnon pas yang dag zhugs //
T02D1304:212a-49: yid 'ong sku mdog sngon por ldan //
T02D1304:212a-50: goo r'i la ni spyi bos 'dud //
T02D1304:212a-51: g-yas kyi phyogs su dbang po ni //
T02D1304:212a-52: rnam par nyed pas steng bzhugs shing //
T02D1304:212b-0: @212b cang te'u sgra sgrogs yan lag kun //
T02D1304:212b-1: btsod mdog tsoo r'i de la 'dud //
T02D1304:212b-2: nub kyi phyogs su nye dbang gis //
T02D1304:212b-3: steng du gar gyis bzhugs mdzad pa //
T02D1304:212b-4: btso mo'i gser mdog rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1304:212b-5: mchog gyur pe t'a l'i la 'dud //
T02D1304:212b-6: byang phyogs drag po'i steng bzhugs shing //
T02D1304:212b-7: 'jigs pa'i sbrul ni phyag na bsnams //
T02D1304:212b-8: rin chen mar kata mdog 'dra ba'i //
T02D1304:212b-10: dbang ldan phyogs su gshin rje yi //
T02D1304:212b-11: rgyal po yang dag gnon pas bzhugs //
T02D1304:212b-14: me yi phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi //
T02D1304:212b-15: steng du gar gyis bzhugs mdzad cing //
T02D1304:212b-16: ston zla ltar dkar dbang phyug ma //
T02D1304:212b-17: mchog gyur sha ba r'i la 'dud //
T02D1304:212b-18: bden bral phyogs su bden bral lha //
T02D1304:212b-19: gnon cing phyag mchog 'khor los mtshan //
T02D1304:212b-20: sprin med nam mkha' lta bu yi //
T02D1304:212b-22: rlung phyogs thags bzangs ris steng du //
T02D1304:212b-23: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02D1304:212b-24: yid 'ong sna tshogs sku mdog ldan //
T02D1304:212b-26: gang zhig mchog tu zab 'di la //
T02D1304:212b-27: gang du bdag gi 'di 'dra'i tshig / gang zhig mgon mchog rgya chen la //
T02D1304:212b-28: gang du nyung sbyar 'di yis bstod //
T02D1304:212b-29: 'on kyang gang phyir bdag gi bu //
T02D1304:212b-30: gzhon nu so thar zhes bya bas //
T02D1304:212b-31: gsol ba btab pa de yi phyir //
T02D1304:212b-33: mgon po lha mo brgyad bcas la //
T02D1304:212b-34: bdag gis mdor bsdus bstod pa yis //
T02D1304:212b-35: dge ba gang zhig thob gyur pa //
T02D1304:212b-36: de yis bdag kyang de 'drar shog / dpal rje
T02D1304:212b-37: btsun dgyes pa'i rdo rje la bstod pa rig pa'i
T02D1304:212b-38: gnas ma lus pa la mkhas pa grub pa'i slob
T02D1304:212b-39: dpon kha che'i yul du 'khrungs pa dpal rin chen
T02D1304:212b-40: rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1304:212b-42: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ku m'a ra ka la sha dang /
